LanguageData.VFEI_ArmoredShuttle.label: armored shuttle
LanguageData.VFEI_ArmoredShuttle.description: A spacer-tech imperial gunship designed for transit between surface and orbit, or between moons of a planetary system. Equipped with a twin-linked autocannon for ground support, these armored shuttles often land in the middle of the battlefield to extract stranded troops.
LanguageData.VFEI_TurretArmoredShuttle.label: double autocannon
